name: CellShock
description:
You, are the scientist who discovered a new form of life. With the help of nanorobots, you conduct an experiment on an "alien" in order to find out its abilities.

Control is performed with the mouse. On the preparation screen, you can select the rules of life (behavior) and set the initial colony of cells. Objective: to get an advantage (numerical) over the enemy in a limited period.

There are bugs in camera positioning and changes in the speed of time
